Answer concisely (1–2 sentences):
Can sharks get cancer?
Sharks are not known to get cancer, but they do have a few other health problems that can cause cancer. One of the most common health problems that sharks face is a condition called "shark skin disease." This disease causes the skin of sharks to become thick and rough, which can make them more difficult to catch and eat. Another health problem that sharks face is a condition called "shark jaw disease."
